name: The Night Shift LD#35
description:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=47199/

Ludum Dare 35 Submission

Theme: Shape Shift

The Night Shift is a puzzle platformer. You take control of a lowly polygon just trying to hold down a job, but a horrible curse is making things difficult.

I took the theme to a kinda weird place. There is also some harsh language in the game but otherwise it's pretty cutesy.

Made in Gamemaker Studio
